description: A directly-attached storage with node affinity

fsType.description: Filesystem type to mount. It applies only when the `path` is a block device. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. The default value is to auto-select a fileystem if unspecified.

path.description: The full path to the volume on the node. It can be either a directory or block device (disk, partition, ...). There can be no '`..`' in the path.
